name: Sebastiaan Alvarez Rodriguez
tagline: Passionate Scientist/Software Developer with strong interest in Security, High-Performance Computing and Software Architecture
about_me:
Enthusiastic, independent, hard-working and co-operative person - Computer Scientist at heart, Software Developer by trade.
I have a strong interest in many fields related to both Software and Hardware: From Chip Design to Virtualization to Software Architecture to Vulnerability Detection.
